safe/peaceful/most/grand

lit. Mount Tai and the North Star (idiom)/fig. an outstanding figure in one's field
lit. to have eyes but fail to recognize Mt Tai (idiom)/fig. to fail to recognize sb important or sb's great talent/to be blind to the fact

sentences.english: My classmates and I started to climb Mount Tai.
sentences.chinese: 我和同学们开始登泰山。

sentences.english: The sound of the lute is soaring and majestic like Mount Tai.
sentences.chinese: 琴声中表达出来的意象象高峻雄伟得像泰山一样。

sentences.english: Hoary Mount Tai looked more precipitous.
sentences.chinese: 古老的泰山越发显得崔嵬了。

sentences.english: Mount Tai has long been the preferred gathering place for artists and poets.
sentences.chinese: 泰山历来是画家骚客所钟情的聚集地。

sentences.english: One of Tai Shan's caretakers and a veterinarian from the Washington National Zoo are expected to accompany them on the journey.
sentences.chinese: 泰山的一个饲养员和一名兽医希望在旅途中陪伴泰山。

sentences.english: Mt. Tai which is located in Shandong Province attracts thousands of tourists every year.
sentences.chinese: 泰山位于山东省，每年吸引着成千上万的旅游者。

sentences.english: Objective to establish the methods for determination of total flavonoids and polysaccharides in Nv'er Tea from Taishan.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立泰山女儿茶中总黄酮和多糖的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: Your lack of routine upsets this steady sign.
sentences.chinese: 你的不守规矩会让这个稳如泰山的星座苦恼不安。

sentences.english: Taishan Electric Co. Ltd. was listed as the 121st of top 500 enterprises in China.
sentences.chinese: 泰山电器有限公司位列中国企业500强第121位。

sentences.english: Mount Tai is most famous for its spectacular sunrise and sunset.

sentences.chinese: 红门宫是泰山中溪的门户，呈半封闭凹形空间。
